commit.message:
expmed.c (store_bit_field): Use simplify_gen_subreg instead of gen_rtx_SUBREG directly.

        * expmed.c (store_bit_field): Use simplify_gen_subreg instead
        of gen_rtx_SUBREG directly.

From-SVN: r91569

files.patch:
